amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding the establishment of a nationwide permanent lifestyle modification program for Medicare beneficiaries.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1118 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1118 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Specter. (consideration: CR S8681, S8684; text: CR S8684) To express the sense of the Senate regarding the establishment of a nationwide permanent lifestyle modification program for Medicare beneficiaries.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1118 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1118 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Specter.
